sentences.english: 5 but the Babylonian army pursued the king and overtook him in the plains of Jericho.
sentences.chinese: 迦勒底的軍隊追趕王，在耶利哥的平原追上他。

sentences.english: 35As Jesus approached Jericho, a blind man was sitting by the roadside begging.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌將近耶利哥的時候，有一個瞎子坐在路旁討飯。

sentences.english: It was Yahweh who broke down the walls of Jericho.
sentences.chinese: 是耶和華拆毀了耶利哥的城牆。

sentences.english: Then you crossed the Jordan and came to Jericho.
sentences.chinese: 你們過了約旦河，到了耶利哥。

sentences.english: Joshua sent these spies into Jericho to bring out Rahab and family.
sentences.chinese: 約書亞派這兩個探子進耶利哥城把喇合和家人帶出來。

sentences.english: the Negev and the whole region from the Valley of Jericho, the City of Palms, as far as Zoar.
sentences.chinese: 南地和棕樹城耶利哥的平原，直到瑣珥，都指給他看。

sentences.english: The Jordan formed the boundary on the eastern side.
sentences.chinese: 他們的北界是從約旦河起，往上貼近耶利哥的北邊。

sentences.english: The Israelites then began to move towards the city of Jericho.
sentences.chinese: 而後以色列人開始向耶利哥城前進。

sentences.english: And the king said, Tarry at Jericho until your beards be grown, and then return.
sentences.chinese: 告訴他們說，可以住在耶利哥，等到鬍鬚長起再回來。

sentences.english: Now Jericho was tightly shut up because of the Israelites. No one went out and no one came in.
sentences.chinese: 耶利哥的城門因以色列人就關得嚴緊，無人出入。

sentences.english: The first problem was the city of Jericho , which lay just inside Canaan's border.
sentences.chinese: 首要的問題是耶利哥的城市就位於迦南的國界內。

sentences.english: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued after the king, and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho;
sentences.chinese: 迦勒底的軍隊追趕西底家王，在耶利哥的平原追上他。

definition: Philistine (Palestinian people, reputedly uncircumcised, c. 1,000 BC)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
